videos.description: Domantas Sabonis finds Aaron Holiday who nails the 3-point shot.

videos.description: Justin Holiday receives a perfect pass from Goga Bitadze and finishes the and-1.

videos.description: Myles Turner flies through the lane and throws down the massive two-handed dunk for the Pacers.
